title: I want to be able to write a book someday. I don't know what would it exactly be about though. How do I go about it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for the question Payal. This is the same Problem am facing now.I love to write and spend thinking more time on writing,but I don't know the strong field of mine like horror,romance,thriller,etc. I am usually following these steps now.if you wish try this. 1.Try to take a note what you are thinking at a particular moment to write. 2.Even that could be a Poem or story whatever,try to make a note. 3.Remember The notes which you keep on collecting Will master you someday on Particular genre. 4.Wait for that day until keep on gathering ideas,make notes,try to make different type of stories in various genre and even write Poems. 5.These note making habit will automatically changes your mind to think in a way what you are good that. 6.That is your strong zone. 7.Grab that and keep on going,no matter what happens try to keep on going in your track. 8.These all Will pay off you one day. My best wishes for becoming one of the finest author in your genre.

Crystallise your thoughts first. What genre would you be comfortable with? The crux of the story and the main characters. The location/s of the story. The time period/s of the story. Do a lot of research thereafter. Read a lot of good stories.
